front.title: •Senator Palpatine
front.gametext: Agendas: ambition, peace, order. While in a senate majority, once per turn, if opponent just drew battle destiny, use 1 Force to add its destiny number to your total power in that battle (you may not cancel that draw). Amidala is politics +1 here.
front.lore: Senator for the Naboo. Advised Amidala on actions required to highlight their conflict with the Trade Federation. Watches young Skywalker's future with great interest.

combo: (Might Of The Republic +) Senator Palpatine + I've Decided To Go Back
